fields.name: Not started
fields.description: The annotator has not started this annotation

fields.name: In progress
fields.description: The annotator has saved at least one observation

fields.name: Ready for review
fields.description: The annotator completed the work and submitted this video annotation for review

fields.name: Complete
fields.description: The lead reviewed the annotation, made edits and judged the annotation of this video by this annotator to be complete

fields.name: Disabled
fields.description: This annotation and all of its observations have been excluded

fields.name: Rejected
fields.description: This annotation has been rejected and all of its observations are excluded. The history is still visible to leads
